column1: To see these additional updates run: apt list --upgradable
13 additional security updates can be applied with ESM Apps.
Learn more about enabling ESM Apps service at https://ubuntu.com/esm

[?2004h]0;aziz@eksporyuk: ~[01;32maziz@eksporyuk[00m:[01;34m~[00m$ mysql -u root -p aziz_member.eksporyuk.com -N -e "SELECT ID, post_author, post_date, post_content, post_title, post_status, post_name, post_parent, post_type FROM wp_posts WHERE post_type IN ('topics', 'course-topic') ORDER BY ID;" > /tmp/topics.tsv
